service.name: /dctm102.dm
service.query: SELECT CUST_ID , HHOLD_ID , COMP_PERS_FLAG , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', SS_NO) AS SS_NO , CUST_NAME , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', CARD_PWD_NO) AS CARD_PWD_NO , HNEW_ZIP_CD1 , HNEW_ZIP_CD2 , HNEW_ADDR1 , HNEW_ADDR2 , HOME_ZIP_CD1 , HOME_ZIP_CD2 , HOME_ADDR1 , HOME_ADDR2 , NOCLS_REQ_YN , HOME_CLS_YN , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', HOME_PH1) AS HOME_PH1 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', HOME_PH2) AS HOME_PH2 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', HOME_PH3) AS HOME_PH3 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', MOBILE_PH1) AS MOBILE_PH1 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', MOBILE_PH2) AS MOBILE_PH2 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', MOBILE_PH3) AS MOBILE_PH3 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', EMAIL1) AS EMAIL1 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', EMAIL2) AS EMAIL2 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', EMAIL2) AS EMAIL3 , EMAIL_YN , EMAIL_AGREE_DT , WED_YN , WED_DT , BIRTH_DT , LUNAR_FLAG , SMS_YN , SMS_AGREE_DT , POST_RCV_CD , OFFI_NM , OFFI_PH1 , OFFI_PH2 , OFFI_PH3 , OFFI_FAX1 , OFFI_FAX2 , OFFI_FAX3 , OFFI_INTER_PH , DECODE(OFFI_NEW_YN, 'Y',ONEW_ZIP_CD1,OFFI_ZIP_CD1) OFFI_ZIP_CD1 , DECODE(OFFI_NEW_YN, 'Y',ONEW_ZIP_CD2,OFFI_ZIP_CD2) OFFI_ZIP_CD2 , DECODE(OFFI_NEW_YN, 'Y',ONEW_ADDR1, OFFI_ADDR1) OFFI_ADDR1 , DECODE(OFFI_NEW_YN, 'Y',ONEW_ADDR2, OFFI_ADDR2) OFFI_ADDR2 , OFFI_CLS_YN , SCOMP_EMP_YN , CHILD_CNT , WEB_USER_ID , WEB_PASSWD , NAME_CONF_YN , I_PIN , '' ENTR_PATH , ENTR_DT , SCED_REQ_DT , SCED_TAKE_FLAG , SCED_PROC_DT , ALIEN_YN , CUST_STAT_FLAG --, '' CARD_NO --, (SELECT DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', B.CARD_NO)FROM DCS.DM_CARD B WHERE A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID) AS CARD_NO , (SELECT DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', B.CARD_NO) FROM DCS.DM_CARD B WHERE A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID AND B.ISSUE_DT = ( SELECT MAX(C.ISSUE_DT) FROM DCS.DM_CARD C WHERE C.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID GROUP BY C.CUST_ID )) AS CARD_NO , ''HORI_ADDR1 , ''HORI_ADDR2 , ''OORI_ADDR1 , ''OORI_ADDR2 , '' CARD_TYPE_CD , 'U' CHKSAVE , HOUSE_TYPE , HOUSE_FLAG , HOLD_CAR_YN , FAVOR_DEPT1_YN , FAVOR_DEPT2_YN , FAVOR_DEPT3_YN , FAVOR_DEPT4_YN , FAVOR_DEPT5_YN , INCOME_AMT , FAMILY_CNT , DEPT_NAME , POSITION , POSITION_ETC , AGENT_NAME , AGENT_SSNO , AGENT_RELATION , AGENT_PH1 , AGENT_PH2 , AGENT_PH3 , LEGAL_AGENT , OFF_TERMS1_YN , OFF_TERMS1_DT , OFF_TERMS1_NAME , OFF_TERMS2_YN , OFF_TERMS2_DT , OFF_TERMS2_NAME , OFF_TERMS3_YN , OFF_TERMS3_DT , OFF_TERMS3_NAME , OFF_TERMS4_YN , OFF_TERMS4_DT , OFF_TERMS4_NAME --, ID_CHECK , NVL(ID_CHECK,'9') , ISSUE_ORG , ISSUE_DT , HOME_NEW_YN , OFFI_NEW_YN , '' AS POCARD_PREFIX , '' AS CCOMP_CD , ENTR_PBN , DPS.FN_GET_PUMBUN_NAME(A.ENTR_PBN) AS ENTR_PBN_NAME --, SUBSTR( (SELECT MAX(B.APP_YEAR||B.CUST_GRADE) -- FROM DCS.DO_CUST_GRADE B -- WHERE B.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID -- AND B.BRCH_ID = X -- ) -- ,5,2) AS CUST_GRADE , (SELECT B.CUST_GRADE FROM DCS.V_DO_CUST_GRADE_CURR B WHERE B.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID AND B.BRCH_ID = ? ) AS CUST_GRADE --, SUBSTR( (SELECT MAX(B.APP_DT||B.CUST_TYPE) -- FROM DCS.DO_CUST_TYPE B -- WHERE B.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID -- AND B.BRCH_ID = X -- ) -- ,9,2) AS CUST_TYPE , (SELECT B.CUST_TYPE FROM DCS.V_DO_CUST_TYPE_CURR B WHERE B.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID AND B.BRCH_ID = ? ) AS CUST_TYPE , SEX_CD , 0 , TM_YN , MOBILE_COMP , CI , DI , '' AS ENTR_CH , STR_CD , ETC_MEMO FROM DCS.DM_CUSTOMER A WHERE (SS_NO = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) AND LENGTHB(?) = 13) OR (SS_NO = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) AND LENGTHB(?) <> 13 AND MOBILE_PH1 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) AND MOBILE_PH2 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) AND MOBILE_PH3 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) ) OR (SS_NO1= SUBSTRB(DCS.F_DECRYPTEDSTR_M(?),1,6) AND MOBILE_PH1 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) AND MOBILE_PH2 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) AND MOBILE_PH3 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) AND SS_NO IS NOT NULL)
SELECT DECODE(COUNT(CUST_ID),0,'N','Y') CHK_YN , MAX(CARD_GRADE) CARD_GRADE , DECODE(COUNT(CARD_NO),0,'N','Y') CARD_NO_YN FROM DCS.DM_CARD WHERE CARD_NO = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?)
INSERT INTO DCS.DO_CUST_GRADE ( BRCH_ID , APP_YM , CUST_ID , CUST_GRADE , REG_DATE , REG_ID ) VALUES ( ? , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? )
UPDATE DCS.DO_CUST_GRADE SET CUST_GRADE = ? WHERE BRCH_ID = ? AND APP_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') AND CUST_ID = ?

--SELECT DECODE(COUNT(CUST_GRADE),0,'N', MAX(CUST_GRADE)) CUST_GRADE -- FROM DCS.DO_CUST_GRADE -- WHERE BRCH_ID = X -- AND APP_YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') -- AND CUST_ID = X SELECT DECODE(COUNT(CUST_GRADE),0,'N', MAX(CUST_GRADE)) CUST_GRADE FROM DCS.V_DO_CUST_GRADE_CURR WHERE BRCH_ID = ? AND CUST_ID = ?
INSERT INTO DCS.DO_CUST_TYPE ( BRCH_ID , APP_DT , CUST_ID , CUST_TYPE , REG_DATE , REG_ID ) VALUES ( ? , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? )
UPDATE DCS.DO_CUST_TYPE SET CUST_TYPE = ? WHERE BRCH_ID = ? AND APP_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND CUST_ID = ?

--SELECT DECODE(COUNT(CUST_TYPE),0,'N', MAX(APP_DT||CUST_TYPE)) CUST_TYPE -- FROM DCS.DO_CUST_TYPE -- WHERE BRCH_ID = X -- AND CUST_ID = X SELECT DECODE(COUNT(CUST_TYPE),0,'N', MAX(APP_DT||CUST_TYPE)) CUST_TYPE FROM DCS.V_DO_CUST_TYPE_CURR WHERE BRCH_ID = ? AND CUST_ID = ?
SELECT NVL(SUM(ADD_POINT),0) ADD_POINT FROM DCS.DO_CD_POINT WHERE CARD_NO = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) AND APP_YN = 'N'
UPDATE DCS.DO_CUST_TPOINT SET POINT = POINT + ? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , MOD_ID = ? WHERE CUST_ID = ?
UPDATE DCS.DO_CD_POINT SET APP_YN = 'Y' , APP_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE CARD_NO = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?)

INSERT INTO DCS.DM_CUSTNM_CONF ( CONF_DT , CONF_SEQ , SS_NO , CUST_NAME , CUST_ID , RTN_CODE , CONF_YN , REQ_DATE , REQ_ID ) VALUES ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , DCS.SQ_NM_CONF.NEXTVAL , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? )

INSERT INTO COM.SMS_SEND_LOG ( SEND_SITE , SEND_TYPE , RECV_NAME , RECV_ID , PHONE_SERVICE_CORP , MOBILE_PH1 , MOBILE_PH2 , MOBILE_PH3 , RECV_MSG , REG_DT , REG_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , DCS.F_ENCRYPTEDSTR_M(?) , DCS.F_ENCRYPTEDSTR_M(?) , DCS.F_ENCRYPTEDSTR_M(?) , ? , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,? )
INSERT INTO SMSMARIO.SOMQ ( SEQNO ,DESTNO ,CALLBACK ,TYPE ,MSG ,REQDTTM ,STATUS ) VALUES ( SMSMARIO.SEQ_SOMQ.NEXTVAL , ? , '0221097000' , 'S' , ? , SYSDATE , 100 )

SELECT CUST_NAME , ENTR_DT FROM DCS.DM_CUSTOMER WHERE 1=1 AND MOBILE_PH1 = DCS.SC_CRYPTO_FUN('ENC',?) AND MOBILE_PH2 = DCS.SC_CRYPTO_FUN('ENC',?) AND MOBILE_PH3 = DCS.SC_CRYPTO_FUN('ENC',?) AND CUST_STAT_FLAG <> '1'
SELECT DCS.F_CHK_CUST_SCED(?||?||?) CUST_NAME , ' ' ENTR_DT FROM DUAL
SELECT ROUND(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(10, 99),0)|| LPAD(ROUND(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(1, 99),0),2,0)|| LPAD(ROUND(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(1, 99),0),2,0) AS SMS_CD FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO SMST_T@SMS_ART ( S_SQL, -- 발송번호 S_ID, -- 발송자 ID S_DATE, -- 발송일자 S_TITLE, -- 발송 제목 S_BALGU, -- 발송구분(바로 발송이므로 1 고정) S_NAME, -- 수신자명 S_HP, -- 수신자번호 S_EXCGU, -- 엑셀입력구분(바로 발송이므로 0 고정) S_MEMO, -- 발송내용 S_SNAME, -- 발송명(공지용 문자 "ARTM"으로 고정) S_SSQL, -- 발송그룹번호 S_GU, -- 0 고정 S_SDATE, -- 예약일자(발송일자와 동일) S_STIME -- 예약시간(바로 발송이나, 발송시간확인을 위해 입력) ) VALUES ( EM_TRAN_MMS_SEQ.NEXTVAL@SMS_ART, 'DCS', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '멤버쉽인증문자', '1', ?, ?, '0', '[아트몰링] 맴버쉽가입 인증번호는 '||?||' 입니다.', 'ART_DCS', EM_TRAN_PR.NEXTVAL@SMS_ART, '0', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MI') )

INSERT INTO EM_TRAN_T@SMS_ART SELECT S_SQL, '', '', S_HP, '1800-5550' TRAN_CALLBACK, '1' TRAN_STATUS, SYSDATE TRAN_DATE, '','','','','', '','','', S_SQL TRAN_ETC4,'4' TRAN_TYPE FROM SMST_T@SMS_ART WHERE S_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND S_HP = ? AND S_NAME = ? AND S_MEMO LIKE '%'||?||'%'
